Extensions.File:
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
REG ADD "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Power" /v HiberbootEnabled /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00
REG ADD "HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager" /v SubscribedContent-316569NtsKey /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
